file_content.text: Beefive = conducting internal maintenance // You = have a fully functional day
Beefive = confirming identities + matching to approved contacts // Your group = stand by for emergency recording
Beefive = confirming identity + matching to approved contacts // You = stand by for emergency recording
This is Master Satele Shan of the Jedi Order, transmitting on emergency frequency Echo Black.
Rogue Mandalorians have attacked a Republic shipyard and several Outer Rim worlds. We must respond to these unprovoked assaults.
If you're receiving this message, you are cleared for high-risk intervention. Volunteers should contact me at Carrick Station. Master Satele out.
Tell Master Satele help is on the way.
Beefive = transmitting acceptance to Master Satele
I have a very bad feeling....
Mandalorians = dangerous + harming innocent civilians // Republic intervention = essential
You = hurry to Carrick Station + teach Mandalorians manners // Beefive = goodbye
Beefive = awaiting important transmission // You = come back later?
